survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Home Energy Management Systems Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who use smart home energy management systems to understand their satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and uncover opportunities for improvement.

questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clear measurement of satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.
